name: DJ Controller
description: Compact DJ controller with built-in sound card and performance pads.

name: Studio Monitor Speakers
description: Pair of 5-inch studio monitors with balanced sound for music production.

name: Turntable
description: High-torque direct drive turntable with adjustable pitch control.

name: Audio Interface
description: 2-in/2-out USB audio interface with high-resolution recording capability.

name: MIDI Keyboard
description: 25-key MIDI keyboard controller with drum pads and assignable knobs.

name: DJ Headphones
description: Closed-back headphones with deep bass and clear highs for monitoring.

name: Mixer
description: 4-channel mixer with EQ, filters, and effects for seamless transitions.

name: Microphone
description: Condenser microphone with high sensitivity, ideal for studio recording.

name: Drum Machine
description: Portable drum machine with 16-step sequencer and classic drum sounds.

name: Synthesizer
description: Analog synthesizer with powerful oscillators and filters for sound design.
